mapper.insert: insert into customer_info (id,policy_no,customer_type, id_type, id_number, full_name, gender, contact_phone, contact_address, benefit_ratio, created_time, creator, updated_time, updater, is_deleted) value (#{id}, #{policyNo},#{customerType},#{idType}, #{idNumber}, #{fullName}, #{gender}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactAddress}, #{benefitRatio}, #{createdTime}, #{creator}, #{updatedTime}, #{updater}, #{isDeleted})
mapper.update: update customer_info set id_type = #{idType}, id_number = #{idNumber}, full_name = #{fullName}, gender = #{gender}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, contact_address = #{contactAddress}, benefit_ratio = #{benefitRatio}, updated_time = #{updatedTime}, updater = #{updater} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from customer_info where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
